nodes.text: Jonat was a female sergeant in the Galactic Alliance Guard and was one of Heol Girdun's favorite undercover agents. She was assigned to guard former Chief of State Cal Omas. She became friendly with him where she allowed Omas to use her comlink to speak with his daughter. This allowed Jacen Solo to record the conversation and use it to give Ben Skywalker the idea that Omas had killed his mother to kill Omas.
